thread.title: Great hotel in the Northwest of Paris
thread.title_full: Great hotel in the Northwest of Paris - Review of Ampere Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: so_voyage49
title: Great hotel in the Northwest of Paris
text:
I had a perfect stay at hotel Ampere: clean, quiet and comfortable room, free wifi, Evian bottle and nice toiletries, "modern" elevator (not one of those horrific old ones so common in Paris), very good discounted price, and finally only steps away from the RER and metro.
When I checked in, the question "do you have a car" really took me by surprise, I guess that's the only hotel I've been to in Paris that has a parking lot... can't believe there are enough mad people to drive there ;)
